EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for a Live Different Tour Internship!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for filling out our survey about the ways you can get involved here at Live Different!
You noted that you were interested in our Live Different Tour Internships! If you'll be graduating this year, you can apply for an internship this fall, but if you've still got a few years before you can join us, let us know, and we can keep in touch with you and send information on our future internships.
We're looking for interns to fill the positions of:
Admin Logistics Speaking Sound Tech
Live Different tour internships are an intense and exciting hands-on way to gain experience working for a non-profit, and to make a difference in the lives of young people all across Canada. Our tour interns are integral to our school presentations program, and help us complete both the on-stage and behind-the-scenes work that help us pull off life-changing motivational productions every day! You'll travel the country, have the opportunity to share your story with thousands of young people, develop new skills, and get to meet great new friends along the way!
For more information, and to apply, please visit our website: http://livedifferent.com/tour-internship
Please feel free to contact us with any other questions.
Thanks,
Live Different Team
